document_data.caption: A map of Callidyrr showing Codfin on the west coast.
document_data.name: Codfin
document_data.mainbody: '''Codfin''' was a small village located in the kingdom of [[Callidyrr]] on the island of [[Alaron]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Codfin sat along the northern end of the [[Strait of Alaron]] on the [[Sea of Moonshae]] on Alaron's western coast southwest of the [[Drowned Forest]]. The [[Tunnels of Dwarvenhome]] passed directly beneath the village.
